entries.title: Time(s) for a change: State Department picks a new official typeface
entries.description: From February, US diplomats and their staff will no longer use Times New Roman.

entries.title: Carnivorous oyster mushrooms can kill roundworms with “nerve gas in a lollipop”
entries.description: Gas chromatography-mass spectrometry ID'd the culprit as the volatile ketone 3-octanone.

entries.title: Authorities dismantle crypto exchange Bitzlato, allege it was cybercrime “haven”
entries.description: Criminal groups served allegedly include Conti, DarkSide, Phobos, and Hydra.

entries.title: RSV vaccine for older adults is 84% effective, Moderna says
entries.description: It's another positive sign for mRNA vaccines and the fight against RSV.

entries.title: Logitech announces $70 webcams with USB-C, built-in shutters
entries.description: Cuter, perhaps, but not vastly different from other Logitech cameras.

entries.title: Very fat tires, a battery, front and rear springs and… a hinge?
entries.description: A little of everything or an awkward balancing act?

entries.title: Elon Musk’s lies about Tesla deal cost “regular people” millions, jury hears
entries.description: "There was no dispute that Elon Musk lied," Tesla investors' lawyer tells jury.

entries.title: D&D maker promises to get player feedback for coming “open” license update
entries.description: WotC producer on leaked OGL v1.1: "We are sorry. We got it wrong."

entries.title: Apple’s full-size HomePod is back with new features
entries.description: New smart home features headline the revived smart speaker.

entries.title: Samsung and iFixit now have parts for the Galaxy S22, Galaxy laptops
entries.description: Strange parts bundles and a limited selection make it more PR than practical, though.

entries.title: Microsoft to lay off 10,000 workers, blames decelerated customer spending
entries.description: “We will have to do more with less," CEO Satya Nadella says.

entries.title: Twitter says third-party apps broke “long-standing API rules,” won’t name rules
entries.description: It's not much, but it's more than app developers have heard in nearly a week.

entries.title: Trump tries to get back on Facebook, claims ban is electoral “interference”
entries.description: Trump was banned in January 2021 for "incit[ing] violent insurrection."

entries.title: How flood forecasts in real time with block-by-block data could save lives
entries.description: New machine-learning methods make it possible.

entries.title: It looks like NASA will finally have an astronaut live in space for a full year
entries.description: NASA has had a series of "almost" a year missions.

entries.title: Top-secret car design studios are hubs for the electric vehicle future
entries.description: EVs offer car designers more freedom compared to internal combustion engines.

entries.title: Today’s best deals: Apple MacBook Air, Razer Blade, Google Pixel, and more
entries.description: Dealmaster also has Apple iPad Air, Garmin's smart scale, portable storage, and 4K TVs.

entries.title: More than 4,400 Sophos firewall servers remain vulnerable to critical exploits
entries.description: Exploiting vulnerability with 9.8 severity rating isn't particularly hard.
